<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armor Assist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6460) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 227 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) or Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

You are practiced in helping yourself and others don heavy gear. You can attempt an Athletics or Warfare Lore check with a DC determined by the GM (usually DC 15 for common armor, DC 20 for uncommon armor, and DC 25 for rare armor) to halve the time you take to [don armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=2168). You can halve an ally's time to don armor by working with them to don the armor and succeeding at an Athletics or Warfare Lore check against the same DC.
